QuestionJSON.Question: Valen is working on a biology project about the growth and reproduction of a special type of bacteria. Valen knows that these bacteria reproduce by dividing into two every hour. Valen started with a single bacteria at 9:00 AM. How many bacteria will Valen have in their petri dish at 5:00 PM if none of the bacteria die?
QuestionJSON.Explanation: Bacteria multiply by doubling every hour. So, the number of bacteria in the petri dish will be 2 to the power of hours. By 5:00 PM, 8 hours have passed, so there will be 2^8 or 512 bacteria.
